text: Need bug fixes and optimisation
@messenger fix your photo quality please AMPANGIT NG BAGONG UPDATE!
@messenger please fix your app keeps going back to the old design every once in a while

@messenger has a serious #bug, one can share live video on screen, even after he/she blocked him/her.
This needs to be fixed immediately.
@messenger i am getting frustrated with the quality of the pictures I am sending through messenger! My recipient always complains! Watdahell
@messenger Messenger team I have trouble sending messages to people from yesterday. Please help me. Thanks Messenger Team
@messenger after so many continuous updates here in the Philippines, we still don't have darkmode. It's so frustrating. Other countries have it already, why not us?
@messenger bug detected . The app change all day between the past and new update. Please fix it

@messenger I just uninstalled Messenger.  I cannot find a fix for my issue. Messenger all of a sudden started thinking my first language is French...It keeps autocorrecting from my English typing into French.  It is impossible to use the app. My setting is English
I actually have a real problem with your product, however I don't have a Facebook account so I can't contact support. Can you help me?
Its not a big problem lol
@messenger after deleting a message, it shouldn't leave behind a residue that the message was deleted. And after forwarding a message, it shouldn't show that the message was forwarded. Please fix it.

Yes, so far so good but some features in Messenger is not covered by dark mode? And I experience some bugs, like in photos that send by my friend. Its kind a blued but on website its clear. Hope to fix this, and remove the circle icon in chat. @messenger
@messenger Hi. I don’t understand, I installed the update and my crush is still not texting me? Am I the only one with this technical issue? Can we fix it?
@messenger app is not working properly. Not sending my messages right away to my Fiancé but it works when I message others. Is it a problem on my end or his?
I already did so but there was no change upto now guys i like messenger but this problem is frustrating me for ril ok give us new update plz
Dark mode does not work at all devices please fix this.
The emoji does not work at all devices please fix this.

The @ name selector feature is broken, in light mode its background is black and in dark it’s white, making the text unreadable. See pic, someone get a Boolean conditional the wrong way round? pic.twitter.com/rkeSeTJIlM
@messenger my Fiancé isn't receiving my messages right away but it's working when I message others. Please fix
@Messenger error messages showing up on the app while accessing a specific convo. beta tester here. fix 'em up pls
My account was hacked and then disabled,  my verified page   is posting images not on my behalf and no human answers as help center doesn’t solve nothing related to this issue.
I need help fixing this problem pic.twitter.com/xebAFQXPph
@messenger hi there - is there an issue at the moment?!
@messenger Is the problem with messenger being fixed to cause I can’t send photos
@messenger there is a problem with the app pic.twitter.com/PP6wGia97c
@messenger I get this every time I try to sign in on my messenger app?... What is that please fix it pic.twitter.com/kBdPiITfQE

@messenger I have questions... Tried to send multiple pics and gifs to a friend, both through Facebook and Messenger... All of it deemed offensive. Error (#368) each time until somehow, a Hitler gif went through.

So to recap, Hitler good, "wash your hads" bad? pic.twitter.com/h1Yc7zYcVy
@messenger is there a problem with messenger? my friend and i haven't been able to send pictures all day. updated and restarted phone and it's still bugged
@messenger you gonna fix my messenger so i can sign in or what?
@messenger fix your shit
@messenger I cannot send photos over messenger. I am getting this error. pic.twitter.com/s5oMyJ7mIK
@messenger every time I try logging into Facebook and messenger I keep getting FBAPIErrordomain 1 and error 1. Tried resetting passwords etc but it’s just not working. What else can I try?
@messenger I'm having a problem: Photos not sending, could send text, deleted the app and now i can't log in again. Just get the FBAPIErrorDomain fel. 1. (am in sweden)
@messenger any chance you can fix the connection issue and photo issue on your app, not been able to connect for the last hour and a half
@messenger is there a server issue going on or something? I can't send pictures or make a group currently.
@messenger having trouble sending attachments. Sends text but not pics. Just started after I updated. iOS iPhone XS Max

@messenger Good afternoon tete is a problem sending photos and images. 
For your attention thanks.
@messenger Something wrong here... A lot of people are unable to send gifs and pictures #messenger #error
@messenger hi I keep getting unknown error occured when trying to login
@messenger we can’t send pictures. please fix this bug. thank you.

@messenger 
Why?
Not consistent?
Please fix the bug! On Android! pic.twitter.com/8wbCixUjOa
